Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Sophia: Hey, silly...$1"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 350/speak Sophia "Thank you for always filling my days with joy and comforting me when I'm down.$1#$b#It's nice knowing there will always be someone there for me.$9"/pause 500/faceDirection Sophia 3/pause 300/speak Sophia "I love living this happy farmer's life with you.$4
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Victor: I remember the last time we were up here. We've both grown so much since then. Crazy how time flies.$1#$b#There's nowhere else I'd rather be than here with you, in this moment.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Victor 3/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 150/speak Victor "Thank you for coming into my life, and making every day an adventure.$1
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Olivia: I don't have a single regret about choosing to spend the rest of my life with you, all those years ago.$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Olivia 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/speak Olivia "I wish I could show you how I see you through my eyes.$3#$b#If only so you could feel how much you mean to me, and how much I love you.$4
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Claire: Taking the job offer at Joja Mart was the best decision I ever made.$1#$b#Goes to show, you never know what the future holds. Or how one choice can change your whole life...$5"/pause 500/faceDirection Claire 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/speak Claire "My heart is and always will be yours...$4
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Wizard: You know, after the way things with my ex wife concluded, and... and Caroline, too...I truly wasn't sure I'd ever find someone to spend my life with.#$b#I thought I might be destined to be alone with my spells, in my tower in the woods.$2#$b#And then you moved into the valley, and it didn't matter that I hid myself away...$0#$b#You came through the woods to knock on my door and find me, again and again. You brought hope into my life when I thought it had died a long while ago.$5"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/speak Wizard "Thank you for trusting me. For believing in me, and giving me a chance at living again.$1#$b#You've given me the gift of joy, @. I can only do my best to return it...and so I shall, for the rest of our lives together.$4

Entries.SummitEvent_Intro_Morris: Ah, @!$1#$e#Come to take a gander at this spectacular view have we?
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue1_Morris: You know, when I was first assigned to this location over %year years ago, I considered it a step back in my career.$0#$b#What self-respecting Joja Manager would want to preside over a tiny, backwater location like Pelican Town?$1
Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue2_Morris: But I have to say, this valley has really grown on me, over the years.$2#$b#Ever since becoming Mayor, my eyes opened to a different way of life. It's hard to say this, but... It's been... a humbling experience.$0
Entries.SummitEvent_Outro_Morris: Together, we brought much needed change to the valley. Cheers the bright future that awaits us, @!$1

Changes.LogName: Adds spouse strings for the movie theater

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Victor: Ah, of course! I'd love to see a movie with you!$3#$e#Shall we walk to the movie theater together?$1
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Olivia: Oh, you want to see a film at the cinema? It'll be a lovely date night.$3
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Sophia: Oooh! A movie? Yay!$9#$b#I'll meet you there okay?$1#$e#I'm going to get cotton candy!$1
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Claire: You want to see a film with me? Sure!$1
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Wizard: You wish to watch a movie at the theater? I'd be delighted.$0
